price: نو د خپل پالونکي له امره يې سرغړونه وکړه نو هغوى ورته كتل چې ټكه (تندر) پرې را پرېوته.
arabic: فَعَتَوۡاْ عَنۡ أَمۡرِ رَبِّهِمۡ فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلصَّٰعِقَةُ وَهُمۡ يَنظُرُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: faʿataw ʿan amri rabbihim fa-akhadhathumu al-ṣāʿiqatu wahum yanẓurūna
